embeds.title: ğŸš€ Starflight Pilot Bot Command Guide
embeds.description: Complete guide to all available commands for the Starflight Pilot Discord bot

fields.name: ğŸ”§ Admin/Staff Commands
fields.value:
**/list_roles** - Lists all server roles with mention codes
**/post_embed** - Posts embed from JSON file to channel
**/backup_ship** - Creates server backup
**/sync_ship** - Restores server from backup
**/embed_create** - Create new embed template
**/embed_edit** - Edit existing embed
**/embed_post** - Post saved embed
**/embed_list** - List all saved embeds
**/embed_delete** - Delete embed template

*Requires Staff Role or Admin Permissions*

fields.name: ğŸ‘¤ User Commands
fields.value:
**/intro** - Introduce yourself to the community
**/plushie_scan** - Register a plushie with optional photo
**/plushie_summon** - View plushie collection
**/plushie_info** - View detailed plushie profile
**/plushie_release** - Remove plushie from collection

fields.name: ğŸ® Fun Commands
fields.value:
**/mission_report** - Get a fun mission assignment
**/fuel_refill** - Send encouragement to crew members

fields.name: âš™ï¸ Prefix Commands
fields.value: **!sync_tree** - Sync slash commands to Discord (Admin only)

fields.name: ğŸ“ Usage Examples
fields.value:
â€¢ `/intro channel:#introductions`
â€¢ `/plushie_scan photo:` (attach image)
â€¢ `/plushie_info name:"Fluffy" user:@Username`
â€¢ `/fuel_refill member:@Username message:"You're doing great!"`
â€¢ `/embed_post name:"welcome" channel:#general`

fields.name: ğŸ“ File Structure
fields.value:
â€¢ Embeds saved in `/saved_embeds/`
â€¢ Backups as `ship_backup.json`
â€¢ Plushie data in PostgreSQL database
